#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

This widget uses flash, .htaccess file, and PHP to make a simple beautiful slide show. Looks great on the side of your web page.


= Details =

Simple steps to get started
  * Resize your photos to 300x200
  * Download all the DynamicFlash files
  * Upload them to your server
  * Create and upload photos to a folder ie. "slideshow"
  * Edit images.php to match your directory
  * Embed the flash widget into your HTML
